text: Jiaru ni lia [ha fu sa he a yi sha] xiang an la huizui,[na dui ni lia shi zui hao de], yinwei ni lia de xin que yi pianxiangle. Jiaru ni lia xieshou duifu ta [mu sheng],[xuzhi] an la que shi ta de baohu zhe, ji bu li lei [tianshi] he xingshan de xinshimen, ciwai hai you tianshimen dou shi ta de zhichi zhe.
